DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether BMS-790052 added to Peginterferon Alfa-2a and ribavirin can result in higher cure rates in patients who previously failed therapy and may have limited response to retreatment with Peginterferon Alfa-2a and ribavirin alone.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Anti-HCV Drug (BMS-790052) Combined With Peginterferon and Ribavirin in Patients Who Failed Prior Treatment
